article.aria-label: Free Breakfast and Lunch for anyone 18 years or younger

h3.a: Free Breakfast and Lunch for anyone 18 years or younger

div.div: During school closures, free breakfast and lunch will be provided as a curbside pickup service at Dartmouth Middle School (5575 Dartmouth Drive) for anyone 18 years or younger. Monday, Wednesday, and Friday | 11:30 a.m. to 12:30 p.m.

Location: Union School District, 5175 Union Ave, San Jose, CA 95124, USA, DO-BoardRoom

The mission of the Union School District is to enrich the community through learning. We are dedicated to children: to involve the community, to anticipate challenges; to take advantage of opportunities; and, to guarantee vital skills for all our children to pursue lifelong learning and become productive citizens.
